Review Text: These were perfect for a night out. Looked very natural and easy to put on. I like that so many come in there they all look similar. Very natural. They feel soft. Really made my eyes pop. Was easy for me to install as a beginner

Works great. It's perfect for adding a little life back into my hair or revitalizing a hairstyle from the day before. I like that it doesn't just drench my hair in fluids. It lightly coats it allowing me better control of how much water, or other liquid, I want on my hair.

Mourvibe
{'Package Dimensions': '3 x 3 x 1.5 inches; 6.07 Ounces', 'UPC': '778365190505'}
I'm not sure if how I applied it is what made it not work or if the product just doesn't work at all.  There was no directions on how to use the product which is the reason for the 1 star it might have been more but I could not get over the fact that it did not come with instructions.  No instructions on the jar, no instructions in the mailing envelope at all.  How are you supposed to know who to apply, when to apply or how to take it off.  I did try and it didn't work but that could because I put it on wrong because again there was NO instructions included with this product.
Did not work on my puff eyes

profile:
**User Profile Summary**

- **Hair Care Enthusiast:** Continues to exhibit a strong interest in products that enhance hairstyles, emphasizing hair health and maintenance.
- **Control in Application:** Prefers products that allow for precise control, seeking lightweight options that do not overwhelm.
- **Practical Utility:** Values functionality and practicality across personal care products, indicating a preference for effective solutions that serve specific purposes.
- **Quality Conscious:** Engages with quality brands and maintains a high average rating for purchases, demonstrating a commitment to effective products. Recent experiences highlight the importance of clear usage instructions, as lack thereof can influence overall satisfaction.
- **Critical Review Tendencies:** While generally optimistic, the user is willing to provide constructive criticism when expectations are not met, especially regarding product usability.
- **Expanding Interests:** Recently, the user has shown an interest in eye makeup, particularly in false eyelashes that offer a natural look. Their positive review indicates satisfaction with ease of application and overall quality, reflecting their preference for effective and beginner-friendly beauty products. 

Overall, the user values effectiveness, control, and quality in grooming and personal care routines, while underlining the necessity for clear instructions to ensure a satisfying experience. This thoughtful approach extends to their exploration of additional beauty categories.
